name: Version 4.4.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Change BUILD_TESTING in the build example to ENABLE_ROARING_TESTS by @zhjwpku in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/740
* missing array include by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/745
* Add functions to skip forward/backward with an iterator, and use it to simplify roaring_bitmap_range_uint32_array by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/741

## New Contributors
* @zhjwpku made their first contribution in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/740

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.3.12...v4.4.0

name: Version 4.3.12
body:
## What's Changed
* Support version constraints when finding CRoaring with CMake by @vyasr in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/739

## New Contributors
* @vyasr made their first contribution in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/739

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.3.11...v4.3.12

name: Version 4.3.11
body:
## What's Changed
* Fixed an issue: missed replacing "free" with "roaring_free" by @ChenHuajun in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/734
* remove an unneded allocation in roaring_bitmap_portable_serialize by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/735

## New Contributors
* @ChenHuajun made their first contribution in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/734

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.3.10...v4.3.11

name: Version 4.3.10
body:
## What's Changed
* fix build error when microbenchmarking is enabled by @jaja360 in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/729
* fix roaring64 iterator state after reading past end by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/731

## New Contributors
* @jaja360 made their first contribution in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/729

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.3.9...v4.3.10

name: Version 4.3.9
body:

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.3.8...v4.3.9

name: Version 4.3.7
body:
## What's Changed
* ALLOW_UNALIGNED should be scoped by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/724
* Fix for issue https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/issues/726


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.3.6...v4.3.7

name: Version 4.3.6
body:
## What's Changed
* replace some more `container_get_cardinality()` by @longqimin in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/715
* Adding OpenHarmony Cross-Compile guide into README.md by @kuniqi in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/716
* Fix C++ include paths for CMake FetchContent by @brawer in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/720
* fixing issue 722 by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/723

## New Contributors

* @brawer made their first contribution in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/720

name: Version 4.3.5
body:
## What's Changed
* better testing for our quickstart by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/714
* adding emscripten build test by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/710

name: Version 4.3.3
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: computation of array container serialized size was incorrect by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/702


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.3.2...v4.3.3

name: Version 4.3.2
body:
## What's Changed

This patch release fixes a bad test and cleans up some dead code. It is a maintenance release. (No bug fixed in the library proper.)

* fix: avoid out of bounds index in PyRoaringBitMap124 test by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/701


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.3.1...v4.3.2

name: Version 4.3.1
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: remove container from roaring64 when removing last item in container by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/700
* perf: speed up roaring_bitmap_remove by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/699
* fix: check required alignment in roaring64_bitmap_frozen_view by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/698


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.3.0...v4.3.1

name: Version 4.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Removing remaining mysterious defines by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/696
* Add frozen support to roaring64 by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/688


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.2.3...v4.3.0

name: Version 4.2.3
body:
## What's Changed
* removing _XOPEN_SOURCE by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/695


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.2.2...v4.2.3

name: Version 4.2.2
body:
## What's Changed
* safety guarantees about deserialize_safe & internal_validate functions by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/675
* fix issue 680 by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/681
* including roaring64.h in roaring.h by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/673
* fix bitset_next_set_bits when called with non-word-aligned starts by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/692
* defining the macro _GNU_SOURCE appears to create troubles in some cases. by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/693


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.2.1...v4.2.2

name: Version 4.2.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Removed leftover printf.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.2.0...v4.2.1

name: Version 4.1.3
body:
## What's Changed
* import roaring.h from the right place by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/658
* clarify bitset_extract_setbits scalar code (BLSI -> BLSR) by @goldsteinn in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/659

## New Contributors

name: Version 4.1.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Add `roaring64_bitmap_move_from_roaring32` function by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/649
* Remove `-Wmodule-import-in-extern-c` warnings by @rockwotj in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/654

## New Contributors
* @rockwotj made their first contribution in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/654

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.1.1...v4.1.2

name: v4.1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Only ignore amalgamation files at the root by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/641
* support AVX2 for run_container_to_uint32_array by @stdpain in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/642
* reenabling AVX under VS by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/644
* fix: remove null checks before free. Reverses commit eb5395b by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/643

## New Contributors
* @perseoGI made their first contribution in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/640

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.1.0...v4.2.0

name: Version 4.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add some missing roaring64 functions by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/628
* roaring64: Don't crash on roaring64_bitmap_free(NULL) by @madscientist in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/632
* fix: introduce macro to initialize to zero structs portably by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/634
* Mark `sum_value` in roaring_statistics_t as deprecated by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/639
* Fix segfault with roaring64 intersect_with_range and empty bitmap by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/636


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v4.0.0...v4.0.1

name: v4.0.0
body:
## Breaking change

This release is a *major* release because we introduced a breaking change in how we compute statistics, see https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/624 This should affect few users.

## What's Changed
* implement roaring64_bitmap_statistics by @AviAvni in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/617
* fix: correct struct init + one array to array comp. by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/627
* optimize roaring_bitmap_statistics (breaking change) by @AviAvni in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/624

## New Contributors
* @springmeyer made their first contribution in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/614
* @Xiaoccer made their first contribution in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/618
* @AviAvni made their first contribution in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/617

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v3.0.1...v4.0.0

name: Version 3.0.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Warning fix by @lucaderi in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/609
* various fixes to macros by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/612


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v3.0.0...v3.0.1

name: Version 3.0.0
body:
## What's Changed

### Major new features

* 64-bit Roaring Bitmaps in C by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/534
* Add support for portable_deserialize_frozen to C++ API by @tudor in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/544

### Details

* Add roaring64 to amalgamation script by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/545
* Fix C++ amalgamation errors by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/547
* Use >= instead of > for art_node*_prev_child by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/548
* Move in-container iteration into containers.h by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/546
* roaring64: container_add_range _is_ inclusive by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/551
* fix(roaring64): add_bulk of existing values no longer reads OOB by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/554
* roaring64: container_remove_range returns null rather than returning an empty container by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/550
* fix(roaring64): art_find_at would return the wrong leaf by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/553
* Use assert_int_equal instead of assert_true for integer comparisons by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/557
* Fix double free in roaring64 andnot_inplace by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/556
* Add a roaring64 iterator and functions for it by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/558
* ART: Fix a few issues around lower bound / erase by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/563
* node48 children can have holes by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/565
* roaring64: implement intersect_with_range by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/567
* Rename roaring_{verb}_iterator to roaring_iterator_{verb} by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/566
* roaring64: Add add_range, remove_range, contains_range, and flip by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/568
* Replace `roaring{,64}_bitmap_of` with `roaring{,64}_bitmap_from` macro by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/570
* Fix roaring64_bitmap_contains_range when the range starts before the first present container by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/572
* Implement roaring64 portable (de)serialization. by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/564
* Implement roaring64_bitmap_to_uint64_array by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/569
* Testing amalgamation files by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/573
* Fix r64 contains range when max is divisible by 2^16 by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/576
* r64 iterator: allow moving from beyond the start / end by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/578
* Using a docker container for clang-cl by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/580
* Run clang-format on the repo, add a github action to check formatting by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/577
* Correct commit hash of format commit for blame by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/584
* r64 iterator: allow moving backward with move_equalorlarger by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/585
* fix: roaring64_bitmap_contains_range now works with ranges starting at the max container by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/587
* Implement roaring64_bitmap_internal_validate by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/588
* Optimize C++ roaring64 contains and addMany by @mapleFU in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/586
* Change map when copying Roaring64MapSetBitForwardIterator by @tudor in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/590
* Simplify, and optimize roaring64_bitmap_remove_range_closed by @Dr-Emann in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/592
* r64: Increase number of frames in ART iterator by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/595
* r64: allow _move_equalorlarger to move from beyond the ends of the bitmap by @SLieve in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/596
* fix C4576 compilation error when compiling CRoaring in C++ on Windows by @SalvatorePreviti in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/600
* This corrects are typo, but the actual objective is to run our CI tests from scratch. by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/601
* disabling AVX routines under Visual Studio by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/603

## New Contributors
* @tudor made their first contribution in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/544

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v2.1.2...v3.0.0

name: Version 2.1.2
body:

* fixing another bug related to issue 538 by @lemire in https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/pull/540


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/RoaringBitmap/CRoaring/compare/v2.1.1...v2.1.2
